title: China: the middle kingdom
creator_credit: Link House Communications and Highlight International Films
brief_description: At one time it was considered the centre of civilization, “The Middle Kingdom”. China’s survival is dependent on its one great resource, its people. A look at China from within, its people and customs, its idealism and shortcomings.
